website_summaries.verdict: The cooker doesn't perform its promised 10 functions well enough to earn a coveted spot on your countertop.
pros: The $299 Gourmia GCR1700 10-in-1 Multi-Function Robotic Cooker, aka the Cook-A-Riffic, has a removable arm that automatically stirs dishes like stews and stir-frys
cons: The promised cooking modes are misleading, temperature settings are wonky and the pot that cooks your food gets too hot too quickly

customer_reviews.title: great product .......except
customer_reviews.text: made my first meal with the gourmia cooker! Chicken alfredo and linguini, it wasn't perfect but that was my fault not putting enough seasoning in it ,but otherwise, being able to watch the meal cook as it was going because of the clear dome was great.My only problem was the package was supposed to include a free white recipe book but it was not in the box.If you could please send me the cookbook it would be greatly appreciated.THANK YOU! john kondrich
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cooker. I made stir fry the other night and it came out perfect. Even with adding a little oil to cook with, the food didn't come out the least bit greasy. I plan on using this a lot. So many things it can do. Can't wait to taste the next thing i make.
customer_reviews.author: April Kimble Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I liked it! Cooks really well and easy to clean. Chicken comes out juicy and crispy and french fries yummy and healthy. I am glad I ordered this air fryer it works great. Definitely recommend this product, good for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mayan

customer_reviews.title: IT SMELLS
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product, I am not very happy it smells terrible a chemical smell I did washed all the parts in hot soapy water. Had to throw away my first meal.I even let it run for awhile to maybe burn the newness out, did not work tried these several times very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: When my unit came it did smell of plastic but after I washed the parts as recommended the smell disappeared
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews I read mentioned a plasticy smell from the machine. When my unit came it did smell of plastic but after I washed the parts as recommended the smell disappeared. So far I have used the steam and grill function on the unit. It heats up extremely quickly and the touch screen is easy to use. I liked that I could pause the machine and adjust the time clock during cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Chana

customer_reviews.title: great stir fry machine
customer_reviews.text: Makes great sautéed onions and mushrooms but you need to experiment with time and temperature. Also good bor pot stickers but does not turn them well. After ten minuted I usually hand turn them. Tends to push most foods around instead of tumbling them around unless very filled with ingredients. But simple stopping and turning once or twice manually works easily. I have had other similar auto stir fry machines and they all suffer from this. Happened to purchase when price was rock bottom at $60 so not sure I'd recommend at today's $130 price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schachter

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three uses!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited for this product as it would make my Whole 30 experience much better and easier. I used it three times, it made exceptional french fries and sweet potato fries, but when I plugged it in for its fourth use, it was dead. No lights, no timer, no nothing came on. Very frustrating and disappointing. I am currently waiting to hear back from Appliatech to see what they are going to do about this.
customer_reviews.author: ecs

customer_reviews.title: Auto Stir my cooking food and I am happy
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous cooker that prepared turmeric sautéed northern baked beans. I used minced garlic, onions, ginger, and coconut oil, browned them using the stir fry mode then added 1 can Campbell’s condensed bean soup and half cup of water and used stew mode to cook the beans until most water evaporated. The cooker performed flawlessly. The package arrived three days after my order. Everything is in perfect condition. Love that it auto stirs the food. Will update as I cook more items.
customer_reviews.author: Recluse

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because it says it gets up to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it says it gets up to 480 degrees F. I measured the cooking surface after 'hi' setting for 15-20 minutes. It was almost 100 degrees cooler than advertised. It will work for most stuff, I guess, but I bought it because it claimed to be capable of high temps.
customer_reviews.author: EJTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Gourmia and the Power Air Fryer. I like my Gourmia the best. I love the stir-fry feature and it grills to perfection. While it doesn't have a rotisserie, the other features far out shine its ability to do that. Besides, the size chicken you can rotisserie is VERY small in the PAF. You won't be disappointed. I have gifted one to my daughter and my sister. They love theirs too.
customer_reviews.author: Beverooni

customer_reviews.title: Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I would like to have it be more user friendly. It's hard to get to the right settings because the icons don't really give you much choice to change them. It's also difficult to remove the food from the pan with the auto-stir spatula in. On the other hand, once I was able to let the time run down to twenty minutes and set the heat as close as possible to 350 degrees, the brussel sprouts came out perfectly roasted!! I also cooked french fries from scratch in it with good results.
customer_reviews.author: Sue O

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility, easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: I got the multi-cooker because I wanted an easy way to cook a bunch of different meals without having to worry about using a million dishes. Everything I've made so far has come out really good. All I have to do is throw in all my ingredients and click a few buttons, and I basically have a full meal with only 1 thing to clean. I could see myself taking this on a road trip. Solid piece of cookware!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooked to perfection!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I tried an easy fish and chips recipe with our new air fryer and we loved it. The fish was cooked perfectly and still had that crispy outside texture that you get with normal frying. We also did some fried pickles that turned out very well. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a healthier alternative to standard frying with oil. Love the new air fryer and can’t wait to try new recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it's convenient in so many different ways! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so great, why did it take so long for me to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I love my versatile "does so much for me" kitchen robot
customer_reviews.text: I love my versatile "does so much for me" kitchen robot. It really let's you press go and leave. No stirring, flipping, or burning those onions. Great having someone man the frying pan for me :) Great service from the company as well. Thanks Gourmia for thinking outside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Z Kudan

customer_reviews.title: This is got to be the best on the area right now
customer_reviews.text: This is got to be the best on the area right now. Does bake potatoes great, no negative issues for me. French fries, chicken parts hash browns, best I had ever.
customer_reviews.author: Blood dog

customer_reviews.title: I do not like that it burns every thing you place in it
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that it burns every thing you place in it. I made a wire rack for it and it still burns food. Have turn heat down but still cook the bottom of food black. Just not what I thought it would be. Tech support not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, Still has Bugs
customer_reviews.text: I tried every remedy I could think of and then contacted the manufacturer for their recommendations regarding the unpleasant taste that was left in the food I prepared in this cooker. I am not sure if the food is taking on the flavor of the plastic stir paddle or the fan which circulates hot air or both. But I could not rid the food of the unpleasant taste. Secondly, the stirring blade would keep things from sticking on the bottom, but it would not mix the food in the pan. What was on the bottom, stayed on the bottom not allowing the food to cook evenly. This is a good idea but still needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best purchase made for the kitchen. My family loves this. So easy and food tastes great .
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I love the slow cook option. I made a vegetarian stew and it was delicious and so easy. I am really enjoying all the free time I am having
customer_reviews.author: Nechama D.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product that can actually Do several cool things
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product that can actually Do several cool things. Not only is it a healthy way to cook fried food without oil, it also grills, And roasts and you can even make scrambled eggs in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: The concept is awesome and the first stir fry meal I made was almost perfect but the next time I used it the display filled up with steam and shorted out so I had to return it. I would definitely buy a new and improved version so I’ll keep my eye out in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L

customer_reviews.title: Great i love it.
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I live this so so much. Cooks bacon to perfection with now worries if grease fire or grease getting all over. I fry my eggs every morning in this after my bacon is done. Clean up is easy and this thing cooks anything. I mostly use it for fried potatos and onions, and just as a frying pan. No babysitting i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cityjuice

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: have been using Gourmia Robotic Cooker for a few days by now. Happy with the outcome, used for grilling, pan fry and stir-fry Only reason for 4 Stars: would be nice to have detachable cover for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good product but keep a protection package
customer_reviews.text: Update: The customer service as promised replaced the product As mentioned earlier, it is a good product. Stopped working on 90th day. There is no heating. It was good while it worked. Not sure how to get it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Blintzer

customer_reviews.title: the steam went into the digital display that become foggy
customer_reviews.text: it does not work as expected and the digital display become foggy from the steam by cooking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking really simple
customer_reviews.text: I think the robotic arm is so smart because it mixes the vegetables for me and I was able to make my homemade pasta sauce and it was such a breeze. This appliance doesn’t have just one feature that is what makes it so useful for people who don’t have time to cook good food.
customer_reviews.author: mushka cunin

customer_reviews.title: It Frys and cooks with NO oil
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this air fryer cause it does more than just frying. I use it as my oven all the time and even perfectly stirs throughout to get a even cook
customer_reviews.author: Abe Sompo

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Air Fry is new to me but I like the spaciousness of this unit and the stirring arm is a bonus. Would be easier to clean if the top had a quick release at each side where the screws are, but other than that I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Love it great addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love it great addition to our kitchen! It really should have came with a cook book for recipes. Mostly use it for roasted potatoes and carrots! Haven't tried chicken or meats yet.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine stephens

customer_reviews.title: GREAT REVOLUTIONARY COOKING DEVICE - PERFECT FOR BUSY MOMS!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product- perfect for busy mom! Just threw some onions, peppers and broccoli and pressed start and in 30 min I had perfect deliciously sauteed stir fry! Clean up was easy too! What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: RAFAEL

customer_reviews.title: I was always looking for something like this!
customer_reviews.text: I was always looking for something like this !! It is multifunctional and also very aesthetic looking as well. I am a college student so this can basically serve many different purposes for me. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: The best gift ever,I bought for myself.
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for my needs.It cooks to the perfection in a very healthy way and it's a time saver. You don't need to supervise it.I even gifted it to my daughter and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: ASHA

customer_reviews.title: Check yours as soon as you get it!
customer_reviews.text: The cooker worked fine mechanically, but the smell was awful. There is some substance stuck on the port above the fan under the pan. It was like that when opened and would not clean off. But I tried it anyway. See pics. I am guessing this is what is causing the smell and taste?
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stir fry option. Nice how it moves the food around.
customer_reviews.author: Sarac29

customer_reviews.title: It has so many features and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a Multi Cooker/Air Fryer for the longest time and my husband surprised me! It came with a detailed manual and even recipes! It has so many features and is easy to use!!! I am so happy with my cooker!!!!!! Cant wait to cook so many delicious meals with my new kitchen toy!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: The food coming of this cooker has a bad chemical smell. Requested refund.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the food coming of this cooker has a bad chemical smell, looks like it's leaking chemicals, probably dangerous, to food. I cleaned all recommended parts in warm soapy water before the first use. Very disappointed, and requested refund. I can see a few other people before me complained of the same problem. What puzzles me is that most reviews seem to be problem free. Is there a problem with manufacturing leading to inconsistent quality? The whole item looks very cheap, metal dish is thin, and plastic parts smell badly.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great multi cooking tool.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hot air fryer that was larger than the one I was using. The Gourmia system allows a broader range of preparing food and increasing the ability to create healthier meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing! So excited to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo excited to use this machine!!! It practically does everything for you!!! Im most excited to see how it will steam the rice and veg as those are our favorite foods. And I'm guessing chicken cutlets will be sooo moist! Looks awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: menahem m goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I made a stir fry with the hand free stirer and it was soooo easy! I just added the veggies in and dinner was ready! Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: hebamadre

customer_reviews.title: It is everything that you said it would be. I’m tickled pink! Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Have used it every day since I received it. With it being so hot outside, I can use my Gourmia instead of the oven or the bbq grill. The only thing that I would like to know is, how to cook rice in it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Montgerard

customer_reviews.title: I used the stir fry function of this product, ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the stir fry function of this product, playing temperature and time settings you may make delicious Chinese stir-fry vegetable dish.
customer_reviews.author: Yisu Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Tabletop cooker
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I wanted it to do except for airfry
customer_reviews.author: IlaLynn

customer_reviews.title: i love this multi cooker
customer_reviews.text: i love this multi cooker!!! the food tastes great so simple to use and looks great on my counter!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Take-Air

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Easy to use. Great for stir frying, roasting, sauces, baking etc. Lots of great functions!
customer_reviews.author: M K.

customer_reviews.title: This multi cooker is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This multi cooker is awesome. I already cooked so many different suppers using just this machine. I grilled vegetables, made a stew, and french fries... so versatile I love it! Will def buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Fadia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Just made delicious fries with barely any oil on this machine. Was easy and convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, haven't even had it a year.
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully the first few months. Only got to use it 5 or 6 times before it broke and will not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: ashleysweetie

customer_reviews.title: In love with this multi cooker
customer_reviews.text: In love with this multi cooker!!! I use it all day. I start off by making my eggs in the morning and meat and fries for dinner. It is such a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness my daughter just can’t say enough good things about this air fryer I gave her for ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness my daughter just can’t say enough good things about this air fryer I gave her for her birthday. Cooks great and cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda hill

customer_reviews.title: Just a horrible experience. When the cooker worked properly one side ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a horrible experience. When the cooker worked properly one side of the food would always get burned, even with the stir attachment working. Never got a single item to cook properly and it was always more difficult than just cooking over the stove or in the oven. This in no way makes life easier. Eventually the front panel stopped working correctly and then the entire cooker went dead in the middle of preparing a meal. This was after using it only four times. But at least I no longer have to try to give it another chance. This thing is going back.
customer_reviews.author: JeffT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this product is great for healthy eating, nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: zev D Morris

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad we purchased this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we purchased this product! What a great item for our kitchen! It cooks, it sautees, it grills...the food tastes great It's amazing how much you can do with this Robotic Cooker! It was delivered in a very timely manner! It's also great for travelling on the road, as you can make any meal you wish with it! It's very well priced for its quality and many different uses!
customer_reviews.author: yossef y harlig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and food comes out great. The whole family loves it. Burger night cooks to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Broke the first day I used it. Food smelled and tasted of plastic. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Coutris

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine, but no ON/OFF power button
customer_reviews.text: It would get a 5 star rating if it had an on/off power button. Since it doesn't, you have to plug-in / unplug it each time. Works great !
customer_reviews.author: d37

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Multi Cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. Looks easy to set up and easy to clean. Excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Niebloom

customer_reviews.title: Looked really good. No warnings around compatible electricity source but good overall result
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use as it was incompatible with NZ voltage so would not work. Had to return product as needed to get compatible unit. Spoke directly with Appliatech representative and worked out a good solution. Very happy with the customer service and hope everyone who uses this has a great experience, looks a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great for a college student!
customer_reviews.text: Makes meals fast, and without needing to stand by the cooker. Food is cooked to perfection with the many settings available. I foresee long term use of my new 10-in-1 cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product for your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great product !Can't wait to actually use it! It just arrived and it has the coolest features!
customer_reviews.author: Rochel

customer_reviews.title: The heat control gauge must be bad because every setting reached the same temperature of about ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was a disaster. First dish was a vegetable stew set on slow cooker for 6 hours. Within 30 minutes the stew was burned. The heat control gauge must be bad because every setting reached the same temperature of about 400 degrees. It may just be a defective device, but I am really shocked at the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Harville Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: OK job but not for what I wanted it to do. Not enough heat to crisp or brown. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Galway

customer_reviews.title: False advertising.  Does not air fry.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the GCR1700 as a Christmas present for my daughter who really wanted the air fryer function, as well as the other multi-cook options. This model does not have an air fryer function. False advertising..... I cannot comment on the operation of the device since I don't have one myself. My daughter is disappointed as am I, but she will not be returning the cooker since it was a present and she is willing to give the cooker a try anyway. .
customer_reviews.author: S Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bella L. Cleveland , Ohio
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it it didn"t work, it was dead...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent multicooker for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: im limited on kitchen space and wanted something small that would make cooking easy. I think of this as an electric frying pan/hot plate that stirs itself. basically that's what it is. you still have to add the right ingredients and somewhat know the basics of cooking but its good. best part is it looks great. worst part is the bright dial on front never shuts off.. its a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: tensacross

customer_reviews.title: Poor Setup Guide and Manual
customer_reviews.text: The appliance manual set up is lacking in how to use and get the most of the unit. I went online to manufacturer and the web site is also lacking in recipes and usage guide. The manual is 6 pages with 4 being consumer protection and warranty pages. I was going to go to YouTube or web search and see how other people are using but then decided based on price and their high claims to be high tech, I did not need this appliance and return for credit.
customer_reviews.author: RafaelG

customer_reviews.title: I might like the item
customer_reviews.text: I might like the item, but there were no instructions included except to wash it befor use. No cooking instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this and expected it would at least have some ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and expected it would at least have some recipes included. I read how it works but no idea how to actually make anything in it. I can't find any information or recipes online either. Very frustrating to have a product I can't use - or return because I was too busy when it delivered to look at it - now too late for a return. Very unhappy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: it makes damn good food as well
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this product, I wasn’t expecting anything more than a decent air fryer, but when I opened up the timely delivered package, I knew that I had acquired something truly remarkable. The sheer number of features packed into one tiny countertop product is a college student’s dream. This product manages to cram 10 (or likely more if you’re creative enough) features into a single utilitarian powerhouse. Not only does this multitasker save space and money, it makes damn good food as well, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zev

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand instructions and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Received it 4 days ago in the mail and have already used it three times! I bought it based on a recommendation from a friend and have been looking for a multi-cooker for awhile. Easy to understand instructions and very versatile, a great bargain for the price. It has been great to use when I am trying to get a lot of things done at once. I was able to leave it on while going out and get back and have food ready when I got back.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Only good for grilling chicken
customer_reviews.text: The worst air fryer t have had (3) over the years. This is great grilling IF you want to grill chicken unattended
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful air fryer and great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air fryer! I tried it the day I got it. No more standing over a hot stove. It did not come with a cooking chart but I found one online that gives you times and temperatures for many foods. It is very big so I decided to get myself a smaller one and give this to one of my daughters. The see through top is a bonus because you don't have to open to see how something is cooking. I think it is an excellent air fryer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing multicooker! Best I’ve used! And a great air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multicooker and air fryer. I set it before I left for work and my veggies were perfectly stir fried when I got home for dinner. I also made sweet potato fries that were so crispy and delicious. Way better than cooking them in the oven! I will definitely be using this device all the time!
customer_reviews.author: A Good Cook

customer_reviews.title: Having fun using my Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I did french fries in it and it was so easy. The clear lid makes it easy to peek in and see how your food is doing. I'm excited to try the other options such as stir frying and grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: I may return this robot cooker.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used this robot cooker was to make soup. Unfortunately, after one use, there is a ring on the inside of the pan where the nonstick coating has come off as a result of using the spinning cone. I even coated the pan with olive oil beforehand. That didn’t help. Otherwise, I would’ve given this cooker a better rating if I weren’t worried about eating the nonstick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Brie In SC

customer_reviews.title: It's so nice not to need to stand and stir the pot ...
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this product! It's so nice not to need to stand and stir the pot waiting for the veggies to saute. The timer mode is awesome!! I can prepare the food, and have a delicious stew/soup when I get home from work! And it's cool looking too, to boot! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dale Gardenswartz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!!! When I opened the box i set it up right away and it was so simple to assemble and use. I made a stirfry and it came out amazing and so easy to clean and barely took any work on my part. So happy with this multi cooker!!
customer_reviews.author: mushka

customer_reviews.title: This product makes cooking so simple and easy. I can just throw everything in and there's ...
customer_reviews.text: This product makes cooking so simple and easy. I can just throw everything in and there's no other work involved. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: This air fryer is great- so many uses. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is great- so many uses. I was always lazy to cook, but this makes it so much easier for me...I make roasts on it, steam veg, and bake fries all in one. Def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Yael Gindi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love our robatic cooker, it can do so much! No longer need to stand over a flame and mix the stir fry, just put the good in and the robot donits thing!
customer_reviews.author: Avrohom Y Perlstein

customer_reviews.title: Nice airfryer, will explore more.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried frozen chicken wing, fries and Brussel sprouts with bacon. it all came out good. I will explore more different recipes. Overall, it's a good helper for my kitchen. You just leave it there and do something else, and I don't have to clean up my cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Milk

customer_reviews.title: Found this super useful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multi cooker. I love the automatic string feature and I love that i can make delicious food while keeping it healthy, because with this air frying multi cooker I'm able to cook with little to no oil.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product very much,much better than frying without grease.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I've made hot wings and stir fry twice. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great to fry without oil
customer_reviews.text: I'm am so excited to use this! It has a lot of room to put food in it and has so many cooking features! Great to fry without oil! Healthy option of cooking!
customer_reviews.author: happy Customer

customer_reviews.text: It is pretty much as advertised in every way. The only part I am not happy with is the control panel and the instruction manual very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like this cooker
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this cooker. I really like the concept and don't think there's anything else similar in the market. However, implementation is poor. The pot had a very strong chemical smell the first few times we used it. We contacted customer service and tried their suggestion of soaking the pan in hot boiled apple cider vinegar. After a few times, the smell was less but I can still taste something different in the food. So after about 10 tries, we gave up and decided to return the item. Better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Hoa

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy read very carefully you still have to ...

product_meta.title: Gourmia GCR1700 10 in 1 Programmable Air Fryer & Multi Cooker - Robotic Hands-Free Stirrer - 1230W - White - Bonus Recipe Book
product_meta.description: 10 IN 1 Grill, bake, steam, saute, pan fry, stew, stir fry, slow cook, roast or make sauces - all a la robot. Breakthrough technology now allows you to step away from virtually any food and return for delicious results. EXCLUSIVE HANDS FREE STIRRER Features top mounted self-operating stirrer for perfect stir fry and saute, Asian dishes, risotto, stews, fries, soup, scrambled eggs and more. Leading engineers have eliminated the need for mixing and stirring, first on the market revolution for home cooks! You've got your hands free for anything but that dirty spoon. Auto circulating system seamlessly moves air throughout the device for an even, perfect cook. Enjoy the moist interiors and crisp exteriors of top notch fries, steak, chicken and casseroles. Meals are now finished quicker and lower calorie - no cooking oil/fat needed. Breeze through cooking with a preprogrammed control panel. Set your dish and go; it's that simple! The Cook Robot features an easy read display for time and temperature, clear view lid, and dishwasher safe auto stir spatulas.
feature_bullets: 10 IN 1: Grill, bake, steam, saute, pan fry, stew, stir fry, slow cook, roast or make sauces- with just one appliance!
AUTO STIRRER: Equipped with an automatic stirrer for completely clean, utensil & hands free cooking. Top-mounted for extra hygiene.
LED DISPLAY: Features a sleek control panel with digital presets and manual cooking settings.
PRACTICAL CONVENIENCE: Equipped with a removable nonstick pot insert, easy-lift handles, clear lid for easy monitoring, and auto-circulating technology for perfectly even cooking.

ETL CERTIFIED: We, at Gourmia, take the quality of our products seriously. This product is ETL certified so you can be confident that you’re receiving safe and efficient appliances of the highest quality.
